l.m: 伏羲诞生在华胥氏之国的旁边有一条水面宽阔的大河，
l.e: Fuxi was born in Huaxu's country. There is a wide river next to it.

l.m: 华胥氏之国的百姓就居住在河的两岸。
l.e: The people of Huaxu's country live on both sides of the river.
The upper reaches of the "River of Thunder",
That is the source of the river,

l.m: 雷泽是雷神居住的地方。
因而这条河的性情也与另外的河流不同。
l.e: Therefore, the temperament of this river is also different from other rivers.
It will move houses on both sides of the strait,

l.m: 使得整个大地都会抖动起来。
人们就说这是雷神发怒了。
l.e: People said it was Thor getting angry.
the disaster of the Thunder River,
And it goes on year after year,

l.m: 如果有人能到雷泽去见一见雷神，
l.e: If anyone can go to Lei Ze to meet Thor,
Persuaded him to leave the Great Lake Lei Ze,
Lei Ze is so far away,

l.m: 在雷河岸上住着一对老夫妻和他们的独生女儿，
l.e: On the banks of the Thunder River lived an old couple and their only daughter,
The daughter's name is Hua Xu.

l.m: 为了劝说雷神离开雷泽，
l.e: In order to persuade Lei Shen to leave Lei Ze,

l.m: 华胥姑娘瞒着父母和乡亲，
l.e: Miss Huaxu kept her parents and fellow villagers a secret,

l.m: 华胥顺着雷河往上游走去。
l.e: Hua Xu walked upstream along the Thunder River.
Pick wild fruits and eat them when you are hungry,
When you are thirsty, drink Leihe water,
Meal and sleep in the wind.
I don't know how long I walked,

l.m: 她的面前果然出现了一个一望无际的湖泊，
l.e: Sure enough, an endless lake appeared in front of her.
Miss Hua Xu looked out over the water,

l.m: 正不知怎样才能得见那个兴风作浪的雷神时，
l.e: Just when I didn't know how to meet the thunder god who made waves,
Suddenly the waves of the lake rolled,

l.m: 从湖底钻出一个人头龙身的怪物来。
l.e: A monster with a human head and a dragon body drilled out from the bottom of the lake.

c.m: 一个人头龙身的怪物来

e.g: A monster with a human head and dragon body comes

l.m: 急忙躲到一棵大树的背后。
l.e: Hastily hid behind a big tree.

l.m: 华胥姑娘踏到了一个印在岸旁泥土中的巨大脚印，
l.e: Miss Huaxu stepped on a huge footprint printed in the mud on the shore,

c.m: 一个印在岸旁泥土中的巨大脚印

e.g: A giant footprint in the mud beside the shore

l.m: 身子不由得剧烈地震动了一下，
就像一股电流流遍全身，
l.e: Like an electric current flowing through the body,
"How dare you come to my abode!
"It was Thor who came out of the water.

l.m: 他的声音震天动地般响亮。
把华胥姑娘拉到湖水下面他的宫殿里去了。
l.e: He dragged Miss Huaxu to his palace under the lake.
Beside it stands a big drumstick.

l.m: 这就是雷神打雷用的工具。
l.e: This is the tool Thor uses to strike thunder.
Flying to the sky and knocking,

l.m: 人们就会听到“轰轰”的雷鸣。
l.e: People will hear the thunder of "boom boom".

l.m: 在湖底敲击这面鼓解闷时，
l.e: Beating this drum at the bottom of the lake relieves boredom,

l.m: 雷泽和雷河就会激起几丈高的波涛。
l.e: Lei Ze and Lei River will stir up waves several feet high.

l.m: 这正是造成雷河两岸人们灾难的原因。
l.e: This is what caused the disaster for the people on both sides of the Thunder River.

l.m: 华胥姑娘非常镇定地说：
l.e: Miss Hua Xu said very calmly:

l.m: 你为什么住到我们的地上来呢？
l.e: Why have you come to live in our land?

c.m: 为什么住到我们的地上来呢

l.m: “但你却给我们雷河两岸的百姓造成了灾难！
l.e: "But you have caused disaster to our people on both sides of the Thunder River!

l.m: 雷神的性情虽然很专横暴躁，
l.e: Although Thor's temperament is very domineering and violent,

l.m: 但他面对这个刚毅的姑娘的正义责问，
l.e: But he faced the righteous questioning of this resolute girl,

l.m: 他从心底里佩服这位姑娘的勇敢，
l.e: He admired the girl's bravery from the bottom of his heart,

e.g: from the bottom of my heart

l.m: 并且被姑娘花儿一般的美丽容貌征服了。
l.e: And was conquered by the girl's flower-like beauty.

l.m: 雷神的态度缓和了许多。

l.e: But you must be my wife.

l.m: ”这时雷神说话的声音简直有些温柔了。
l.e: "At this time, Thor's voice was almost gentle.

l.m: 雷神答应不久迁离雷泽，
l.e: Thunder God promised to move out of Lei Ze soon,

l.m: 华胥姑娘便同意了雷神的求婚。
l.e: Miss Huaxu agreed to Thor's marriage proposal.

l.m: 雷神不但对待华胥姑娘温柔体贴，
l.e: Lei Shen not only treats Miss Hua Xu tenderly and considerately,

l.m: 而且不再随便在雷泽敲击他的鼓，
l.e: And no longer beating his drum casually in Razer,

l.m: 于是雷泽和雷河从此平静起来。
l.e: So Lei Ze and Lei He calmed down.

l.m: 华胥姑娘生下一个男孩。
l.e: Miss Hua Xu gave birth to a boy.

l.m: 华胥姑娘很想念自己的家乡，
l.e: Miss Hua Xu misses her hometown very much.
I can't go back by myself,

l.m: 应该把亲生的孩子送回华胥国吧。
l.e: He should send his own child back to Huaxu Country.
She took advantage of Thor to go out,

l.m: 便把男孩放在一个很大很大的葫芦里，
l.e: So he put the boy in a big, big gourd,

c.m: 一个很大很大的葫芦里

l.m: 这个葫芦简直像只小船。
l.e: This gourd is like a boat.

l.m: 当她把葫芦推进湖里时，
l.e: When she pushed the gourd into the lake,

l.m: 葫芦很快就顺着水流向雷河下游漂去。
l.e: The gourd soon drifted down the current to the lower reaches of the Thunder River.

l.m: 这天华胥姑娘的爸爸正在河边捕鱼。
l.e: That day, Miss Hua Xu's father was fishing by the river.
He looked at the rolling river,
I feel like I miss my daughter,
A gourd floats along the water,

l.m: 便用长竿把葫芦打捞上岸。
l.e: Then he salvaged the gourd ashore with a long pole.

l.m: 他和老伴儿打开葫芦口一看，
l.e: He and his wife opened the mouth of the gourd and took a look.

l.m: 里边睡着一个白白胖胖的小男孩。
l.e: A fat little boy was sleeping inside.

c.m: 一个白白胖胖的小男孩

l.m: 孩子身上裹着一件花布衣服。
l.e: The child was wrapped in a floral cloth dress.
My wife cried out in surprise.

l.m: 原来这正是自己女儿的衣服啊！
l.e: It turned out that this was my daughter's clothes!

l.m: 再仔细地端详这个孩子，
l.e: Take a closer look at this child,

l.m: 眉宇之间都跟自己的女儿很像。
l.e: The eyebrows are very similar to their own daughter.

l.m: 这一定是自己的外孙了。
长久悲伤的老夫妻带来了莫大的安慰。
l.e: A long-grieving old couple brings great comfort.

l.m: 他们欣喜万分地收养了这个孩子。
l.e: They were overjoyed to adopt the child.

c.m: 他们欣喜万分地收养了这个孩子

e.g: They were overjoyed to adopt the child

l.m: 华胥国的人们听到这个消息，
l.e: When the people of Huaxu heard the news,

l.m: 但这个孩子还没有名字呢，
l.e: But the child has no name yet,

l.m: 因为他是装在葫芦里漂来的，
l.e: Because he floated in a gourd,

l.m: 外婆就给他取了个名字叫“伏羲”。

l.e: "Fuxi" is the dialect of Huaxu Kingdom,
